summary: A small room where the player can rest and store items, with some crafting equipment.
descriptionHtml:
To enter, go to Riverwood and use the trapdoor on the rock next to Alvor\'s forge.

--Current Development--

Adding extra rooms so everything is not bunched up (thanks to YogurtKid for the tip)
Adding exits to the individual cities

--To do--

Make the room more cosy and warm-looking
Add more decorations / expand into additional rooms
Add more entrances and exits so it can be reached in every city.

--Change log--

v 1.0.1

Fixed cell name to properly display \'Your First Home\'
Edited lighting to make it more moody.

v 1.0

Mod made
author: Arathmorr
